00014 #ifndef LIF_H
00015 #define LIF_H
00016 
00017 #include "il_internal.h"
00018 
00019 typedef struct LIF_HEAD
00020 {
00021     char        Id[8];                  //"Willy 7"
00022     ILuint      Version;                // Version Number (260)
00023     ILuint      Flags;                  // Usually 50
00024     ILuint      Width;
00025         ILuint  Height;
00026     ILuint      PaletteCRC;             // CRC of palettes for fast comparison.
00027     ILuint      ImageCRC;               // CRC of the image.
00028         ILuint  PalOffset;              // Offset to the palette (not used).
00029         ILuint  TeamEffect0;    // Team effect offset 0
00030         ILuint  TeamEffect1;    // Team effect offset 1
00031 } LIF_HEAD;
00032
